entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:08 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 12:56 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late this evening then light before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
